definition.name: NXchamber
definition.doc: Component of an instrument to store or place objects and specimens.

field.name: model
field.doc: Given brand or model name by the manufacturer.

field.name: serial_number
field.doc: Given hardware name/serial number or hash identifier issued by the manufacturer.

field.name: description
field.doc: Describe details about the chamber, for instance out of which material it was built.
